auth.enter-your-name-email-and-password-to-cr: Enter your name, email, and password to create an account.

game.waiting-for-other-player-to-end-round: Waiting for other player to end round
game.you-can-only-reshuffle-cards-once-per-ga: You can only reshuffle cards once per game.
game.you-can-only-reshuffle-cards-during-the-: You can only reshuffle cards during the select card phase.
game.are-you-sure-you-want-to-reshuffle-your-: Are you sure you want to reshuffle your cards?
game.this-action-will-reshuffle-all-your-card: This action will reshuffle all your cards in the deck and draw a new hand of cards. You can only do this once per game.

game-node.internal-network-hub: Connects devices inside an organization. A compromised hub can let attackers intercept or reroute internal communications.
game-node.database-server: A server that stores and manages critical data such as user credentials and business records. If compromised, attackers can steal or alter data.
game-node.web-server: Hosts websites and applications. It's often the first target in cyberattacks such as DDoS or code injection.
game-node.cloud-storage: A service to store files online. Without protection, it can lead to data leaks or unauthorized access.
game-node.iot-device: Smart devices connected to a network. Often unsecured, making them easy targets for hackers.
game-node.email-server: Handles sending and receiving emails. It's a common target for phishing and malware attacks.
game-node.workstation: A user's device like a PC or laptop. It's a common entry point for malware and social engineering attacks.

game-defense.firewall-edu: It acts like a gatekeeper, allowing safe traffic and blocking potentially harmful connections to or from a network or device.
game-defense.ids-edu: Monitors network or system behavior for signs of attack. It alerts defenders when something unusual is detected.
game-defense.antivirus-edu: Scans for, detects, and removes malicious software like viruses, trojans, or worms on devices like workstations.
game-defense.network-segmentation-edu: Divides a network into smaller zones, so if one part is compromised, the rest stays secure, like isolating fires in separate rooms.
game-defense.anomaly-detection-edu: Uses behavior models to find things that don't belong, such as unexpected data transfers or login times.
game-defense.spam-filter-edu: Automatically detects and blocks unwanted or dangerous emails, like phishing attempts, before they reach your inbox.
game-defense.encryption-edu: Converts data into unreadable code unless you have the key. Protects sensitive information in storage or transit.
game-defense.mfa-edu: Requires more than just a password, like a code from your phone or fingerprint, making it harder for attackers to break in.

game-card.cas-network-scanning-desc: Scan the network. Ignore 1 defense to reveal the data token of target node.
game-card.cas-social-engineering-desc: Manipulate defender action. Reveal 3 random defender cards in hand.
game-card.cas-port-scanning-desc: Scan for active port in target node. Reveal 3 active defenses of target node.
game-card.caa-sql-injection-desc: Inject an SQL payload. Steal 1 data token and reveal data token from target node.
game-card.caa-phishing-attack-desc: Trick user into revealing credential. Steal 1 data token from a target node and reveal 2 defender cards.
game-card.caa-zero-day-exploit-desc: Bypass 3 defenses to steal 1 data token from a node. After use reveal 1 random attacker card.
game-card.cdb-firewall-upgrade-desc: Add firewall on target node. Block 1 attack on target node.
game-card.cdb-mfa-implementation-desc: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication. Block attack to target node for 1 attack.
game-card.cdb-network-segmentation-desc: Segregate the network of target node. Ignore attack on target node in this round and block 1 attack on target node.
game-card.cdd-security-awareness-desc: Train opeartor security awareness. Reveal 3 attacker card in hand.
game-card.cdd-add-spam-filter-desc: Add Spam Filter to target node. Block attack to target node for 1 attack.
game-card.cdd-ids-installation-desc: Install Intrusion Detection System. Add 1 defense to target node and hide 2 defenses from attacker.
game-card.cdb-data-encryption-desc: Encrypt Data of target node. Block attack to target node for 1 attack and hide data token in target node from attacker.
game-card.cdb-antivirus-instalation-desc: Install Antivirus. Ignore attack on target node in this round and add 1 defense to block attack.
game-card.cdd-add-anomaly-detection-desc: Add Anomaly Detection to target node. Block 1 attack on target node and hide 1 defense from attacker.
game-card.cad-ddos-desc: Launch Distributed Denial of Service on target node. Ignore action played by defender on target node and reveal 1 defense.
game-card.cad-privilege-escalation-desc: Gain admin access. Reveal 2 defenses from target node and 2 cards from defender hand.
game-card.cad-backdoor-installation-desc: Install backdoor on target node. Ignore action played by defender on target node and reveal data token.
game-card.caa-ransomware-attack-desc: Launch Ransomware Attack on target node. Ignore 2 defenses and steal 1 data token from target node.
game-card.caa-bruteforce-attack-desc: Try all ways to crack the target node. Steal 1 data token from target node.
game-card.cas-man-in-the-middle-desc: Intercepts communication. Show 2 cards to defender and reveal 5 cards from defender.
game-card.cas-vpn-tunneling-desc: Use compromised VPN to access target node from inside. Ignore defender action to reveal data token of target node.
game-card.cad-log-tampering-desc: Modify the log of target node. Cancel defender action on target node in this round.
game-card.cad-session-hijacking-desc: Try to bypass active session. Reveal 1 defense from target node and 1 defender card.
game-card.cdd-honeypot-deployment-desc: Deploy Honeypot to confuse attacker. Ignore attacker attack on target node and reveal 3 attacker card.
game-card.cdr-incident-response-desc: Create Incident Response procedure. Hide 2 defenses in target node from attacker.
game-card.cdr-forensic-investigation-desc: Investigate digital traces from attacker. Hide data token from target node and reveal 2 attacker card.
game-card.cdr-threat-intelligence-desc: Learn from previous threat. Show 2 cards to attacker and recover 1 stolen data token to target node.
game-card.cdr-vulnurability-patching-desc: Patch attack done to target node. Recover 1 stolen data token to target node.
game-card.cdr-backup-recovery-desc: Recovery data from backup. Hide 2 defenses and data token in target node from attacker.

game-effect.ignored-ignoreddefenses-defense-s-but-at: ignored {ignoreDefenses} defense(s), but attack blocked by remaining defenses
game-effect.attack-blocked-by-defense-no-data-token-: attack blocked by defense, no data token stolen
game-effect.gamenode-name-defense-blocked-the-attemp: {gameNode} defense blocked the attempted attack, no data token stolen
game-effect.no-data-token-in-target-node: no data token in target node
game-effect.gamenode-name-defense-is-already-maxed-n: {gameNode} defense is already maxed, no new defense added
game-effect.no-attempted-attack-to-ignore-in-target-: no attempted attack to ignore in target node
game-effect.no-defenses-in-target-node-to-reveal: no defenses in target node to reveal
game-effect.revealcards-card-s-revealed-from-your-ha: {revealCards} card(s) revealed from your hand by the {by}
game-effect.revealcards-cards-revealed-from-your-han: {revealCards} card(s) revealed from your hand to the {to}
game-effect.from-has-revealed-revealcards-cards-from: {from} has revealed {revealCards} card(s) from their hand to you
game-effect.defender-has-healed-tokentoheal-data-tok: defender has healed {tokenToHeal} data token(s) from {gameNode}, stolenTokens is now {stolenTokens}
game-effect.no-data-tokens-to-heal-in-gamenode-name: no data tokens to heal in {gameNode}
game-effect.no-attempted-defense-to-ignore-in-target: no attempted defense to ignore in target node
game-effect.no-defenses-in-target-node-to-hide: no defenses in target node to hide
game-effect.gamenode-name-data-token-is-still-hidden: {gameNode} data token is still hidden to attacker
